name: process_constructions_exterior_insulated_walls_wood_stud
display_name: Process Constructions Exterior Insulated Walls Wood Stud

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the living space

arguments.name: selectedgypsum
arguments.display_name: Interior finish  of wall cavityFor manually entering interior finish properties of wall cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedgypthickness
arguments.display_name: Thickness of drywall layers

arguments.name: userdefinedgyplayers
arguments.display_name: Number of drywall layers

arguments.name: selectedstudsize
arguments.display_name: Wood stud size of wall cavity

arguments.name: selectedspacing
arguments.display_name: Wood stud spacing of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedinstcavr
arguments.display_name: Installed R-value of cavity insulation

arguments.name: selectedinstallgrade
arguments.display_name: Insulation installation grade of wood stud wall cavity

arguments.name: selectedinsfills
arguments.display_name: Cavity insulation fills the cavity

arguments.name: selectedrigidins
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation of wall cavityFor manually entering rigid insulation properties of wall cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedrigidinsthickness
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation thickness of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedrigidinsr
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation R-value of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedhasosb
arguments.display_name: Wood stud wall has OSB sheathing

arguments.name: selectedextfin
arguments.display_name: Exterior finish of wall cavityFor manually entering exterior finish properties of wall cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedextfinthickness
arguments.display_name: Exterior finish thickness of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedextfinr
arguments.display_name: Exterior finish R-value of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedextfindensity
arguments.display_name: Exterior finish density of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedextfinspecheat
arguments.display_name: Exterior finish specific heat of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedextfinthermalabs
arguments.display_name: Exterior finish emissivity of wall cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedextfinabs
arguments.display_name: Exterior finish absorptance of wall cavity

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of wood stud constructions for the exterior walls adjacent to the living space. Finds surfaces adjacent to the living space and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates wood stud constructions for the exterior walls adjacent to the living space.
